ComicInfo.Summary:
Out of options and facing certain death, Captain Sable and her crew are forced into an uneasy alliance with their deadliest rival...the evil pirate Captain Blood! Blood agrees to help keep them alive that is, until they can lead him to the most valuable treasure in the galaxy.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ian Richardson & Hedwin Zaldivar | 1 | B | Cover B | Sheldon Goh & Sanju Nivangune | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 | D | Cover D | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | Cover E | Netho Diaz & Jorge Cortes | 5 |
